```{r}
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
obj <- readRDS("/Users/lukashat/Downloads/breast_fibro_IMC/7540604/IMC/all_cells_annotated_final.rds")
```

```{r}
cell_data <- as.data.frame(colData(obj))
expression_matrix <- assay(obj, 'c_counts_asinh')
```
```{r}
df <- cbind(cell_data, t(expression_matrix))
```
```{r}
write.csv(df, file = "/Users/lukashat/Downloads/breast_fibro_IMC/7540604/IMC/beast_fibro_IMC.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
